item.title: Department of Defense, Emergency Supplemental Appropriations to Address Hurricanes in the Gulf of Mexico, and Pandemic Influenza Act, 2006

item.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection. (text: CR H13183)
Passed/agreed to in House: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.(text: CR H13183)
RESERVATION OF OBJECTION - Mr. Fitzpatrick raised the right to object to the consideration of S. Con. Res. 74. Mr. Fitzpatrick later withdrew his objection.
RESERVATION OF OBJECTION - Mr. Obey raised the right to object to the consideration of S. Con. Res. 74. Mr. Obey later withdrew his objection.
Mr. Wolf asked unanimous consent to take from the Speaker's table and consider. (consideration: CR H13181-13183)

Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 45. Record Vote Number: 365. (consideration: CR S14233-14240; text as passed Senate: CR S14240; text of measure as introduced: CR 12/22/2005 S14337)

Passed/agreed to in Senate: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 45. Record Vote Number: 365.(consideration: CR S14233-14240; text as passed Senate: CR S14240; text of measure as introduced: CR 12/22/2005 S14337)
Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.

summary.text: Directs the Clerk of the House of the Representatives to make corrections in the enrollment of H.R. 2863 (Department of Defense Appropriations Act, 2006) by striking Division C, the American Energy Independence and Security Act of 2005 (allowing oil well drilling in the Arctic National Wildlife Refuge) and Division D, the Distribution of Revenues and Disaster Assistance.

(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)

Directs the Clerk of the House of the Representatives to make corrections in the enrollment of H.R. 2863 (Department of Defense Appropriations Act, 2006) by striking Division C, the American Energy Independence and Security Act of 2005 (allowing oil well drilling in the Arctic National Wildlife Refuge) and Division D, the Distribution of Revenues and Disaster Assistance.

(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)

Directs the Clerk of the House of the Representatives to make corrections in the enrollment of H.R. 2863 (Department of Defense Appropriations Act, 2006) by striking Division C, the American Energy Independence and Security Act of 2005 (allowing oil well drilling in the Arctic National Wildlife Refuge (ANWR)) and Division D, the Distribution of Revenues and Disaster Assistance.

dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.
dublinCore.dc:contributor: Congressional Research Service, Library of Congress
dublinCore.dc:description: This file contains bill summaries and statuses for federal legislation. A bill summary describes the most significant provisions of a piece of legislation and details the effects the legislative text may have on current law and federal programs. Bill summaries are authored by the Congressional Research Service (CRS) of the Library of Congress. As stated in Public Law 91-510 (2 USC 166 (d)(6)), one of the duties of CRS is "to prepare summaries and digests of bills and resolutions of a public general nature introduced in the Senate or House of Representatives". For more information, refer to the User Guide that accompanies this file.
